text: Kamaghɨn amizɨ, nguazim kuiaghirɨzɨ mati maburan torim oto, ezɨ me bar irava an aven iraghuezɨ, nguazim ua uabɨ dukuazɨ me bar ariaghire. Dughiar kamɨn, avim izaghira 250plan gumazir Koran gɨn zuibar isia, me gasɨghasɨki. Arazir kamɨn, God fofozim ko ikiangsɨzim Israelia ganɨngigha ghaze, me uaghan arazir kurar me amizim uam a damuan kogham.
